event.title: was named Gilead in its original grant in 1780

data.event: The town was named Gilead in its original grant in 1780.

event.title: was finally changed by the legislature to Brighton in 1832

data.event: The town's name was finally changed by the legislature to Brighton in 1832.

event.title: maintains 130 miles of trails during the winter

data.event: The Brighton Snowmobile Club maintains 130 miles of trails during the winter.
